details.sectionContent: This event is all about the quick-wit, proficiency and to some level typing skills of the contestants
This event will challenge the participants to think out of box, with rounds that will help some of them in their curriculum in future. It is all about gaining knowledge while enjoying the event.

This round is a paper-pen quiz. o In each question there will be a statement followed by two conclusions numbered I and II.  You have to assume everything in the statement to be true, then consider the two conclusions together and decide which of them logically follows beyond a reasonable doubt from the information given in the statement.

This round is based upon the theory of tower of Hanoi (with 3 rings). There will be a team of two. Participants will be asked a question; if they answer it correctly they will get a chance to move one ring. o First one to move all the 3 rings in correct order will be the winner.

This round is the game 'Passing the Parcel' but instead of giving punishment to the guilty , the contestant will have to choose a chit in which either they have to (1) perform coding with monitor switched off or (2) Given any app/website they will have to describe its workflow.
